This code is currently in flux - we are backing out some API.  We haven't
actually released any changes in UI yet, but I'll make sure all UI tests pass by
the time we're done.

Fixed.  All changes have been released and all UI tests pass when
org.eclipse.core.resources is loaded from HEAD.  See bug 80396 for details of
the changes that were made.
